work.description: RevaComm is an enterprise digital transformation company providing consulting, design, and software engineering services. It specializes in DevSecOps, agile web and software development, staff augmentation, cloud hosting and support, and cybersecurity assessment. The company serves government, defense, and corporate markets.
highlights: Be responsible for managing software products and lead IT execution and delivery
Engage with the customer and project teams daily to ensure both groups are happy
Be the customer point-of-contact for issues and outcomes
Oversee technical team efforts to ensure alignment with stakeholder objectives
Track project cost, schedule, and resource performance aligned with project scope
Manage team workload and outcomes
Be the facilitator to remove any team blockers
Engage with key stakeholders as necessary to align technical tasks as appropriate
Be required to have and maintain the insights into the project and team as to when they are blocked
Manage iteration planning meetings, sprints, backlogs, and roadmap
Assist managers/training team members with training and occasionally posting updates to support their online communities or interest groups
Provide support for outreach events outside program to grow RevaComm
Responsible for follow-up and customer satisfaction surveys/NPS
Provide weekly updates on actions/progress taken during the week
Provide month-end reports to internal and external stakeholders
work.summary: RevaComm Project Managers serve our project teams and help to drive toward the desired outcomes. This covers a wide variety of tasks like strategic program development, proposal writing, opportunity mining, customer coordination, customer service, project management, program and project reporting, program and project marketing, budgeting and time management, as well as other services.

Helped map dependencies of all work, across all product teams
